alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Albany, north central Greene and southeastern Schoharie Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Preston Hollow, or 14 miles north of Hunter, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, Durham, Durso Corner, East Durham, Norton Hill, Cooksburg, West Durham, Bates, West Greenville, Smith Corner, Medusa, East Greenville, Cornwallville, O`hara Corners, Potter Hollow, Lambs Corner, Oak Hill, East Windham and Hervey Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene
